To improve the methods by which the Secretary of Veterans Affairs identifies health care providers that are not eligible to participate in the Veterans Community Care Program.

bill.summary:
Improving Oversight of the Veterans Community Care Providers Act of 2022
This bill requires the Veterans Health Administration to carry out a plan to improve the methods by which the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) identifies health care providers that are not eligible to participate in the Veterans Community Care Program.
The VA must certify to Congress it has implemented the plan not later than 270 days after the enactment of this bill.
